meanings.sent1: The small pill was easily swallowable.
meanings.sent2: The medicine was designed to be swallowable without any difficulty.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fish thought the giant whale was not swallowable.
meanings.sent4: The idea of success seemed as swallowable as a bitter pill.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel was as swallowable as a magical potion.

meanings.sent1: The liquid was swallowable and tasted like strawberries.
meanings.sent2: The food was soft and easily swallowable for the baby.
meanings.sent3: The joke about a giant sandwich being swallowable made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as swallowable as honey, soothing his worries.
meanings.sent5: The adventure seemed as swallowable as a sweet treat, tempting and enjoyable.
